item.description:
FREE High Holiday Services followed by Jewish New Years Party for young adults!

Tell everyone you Know!!!

Whether you’re bored every year and go for family…or nostalgia…or guilt…or just haven’t gone for years…give it one more chance....

Please join us for services in English with meaning, melody and humor by Rabbi Mayshe Schwartz. English/Hebrew books provided.

RSVP NOW!

www.GetChai.Com/HH2012

Rosh Hashanah
Sunday Sep 16th

Candle Lighting- 6:30 pm
Services – 6:45 pm

Followed by the “Apple-in-honey-dipping” New Years Party with deicious desserts and a open wine bar!!!

At the

very chic Longwood Club
20 Chapel Street, Brookline

We will be offering FREE services throughout the High Holidays.
To see a full detailed schedule visit our website GETCHAI.com
item.name: Jewish New Years Party 20s/30s
